scripts.build: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run build" "cd api-server && npm run build"
scripts.clean: concurrently "rimraf node_modules" "cd frontend && rimraf node_modules build" "cd api-server && rimraf node_modules build"
scripts.install: (cd frontend && npm install) && (cd api-server && npm install)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && PORT=3000 npm run start" "cd api-server && node server"
